description: WHY SHOULD YOU BUY TECH ARMOR SCREEN PROTECTORS?DID YOU KNOW - A screen full of scratches will lower your resale value!PRESERVE YOUR INVESTMENT AND MAXIMIZE RESALE VALUE - The Tech Armor Matte AntiGlare screen protector not only reduces glare and resists fingerprints, but also protects your screen from scratches that reduce the resale value of your Nexus 7 (Original 1st Generation) Tablet!No detail has been overlooked with this "Best-In-Class" product from Tech Armor - industry leader in screen protection.If you only accept theBESTfor your Nexus 7 (Original 1st Generation) Tablet, look no further:BESTAnti-Glare technologyBESTAnti-Fingerprint coatingBESTBubble free installationBESTProtection from ScratchesBESTTouchscreen AccuracyBESTHassle-Free Lifetime WarrantyThe Tech Armor Antiglare screen protector combines scratch protection with a unique matte finish dramatically improving visibility in bright sunlight or office lights.Use your device wherever you are, whenever you want!COMPATIBILITY:Google Nexus 7 (Original 1st Generation) Tablet, All Carriers, All ModelsThe TECH ARMOR Anti-Glare Screen Protector Kit Includes:Three (3) Screen Protectors- Installation Instructions- Smoothing Card- Microfiber Cloth- Dust Removal Tape- Retail Packaging- Tech Armor Lifetime Replacement Warranty
title: Tech Armor Anti-Glare and Anti-Fingerprint Screen Protector with Lifetime Replacement Warranty for Google Nexus 7 Tablet [3-Pack](Matte)
